tr_quotes.quote: Belirsizlik en kötü ihtimalden daha acı vericidir.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan psikolojisi, belirsizlik dışında her şeyi göğüslemeye müsaittir.
tr_quotes.author: Mürsel Ferhat Sağlam

tr_quotes.quote: Zafer geçici, belirsizlik ebedidir.
tr_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

tr_quotes.quote: Belirsizliğin bu kadar kötü olmasının sebebi, içinde umut olmasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Nafer Ermiş

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamınızın kalitesi rahatlıkla başa çıkabileceğiniz belirsizlik miktarı ile doğru orantılıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

tr_quotes.quote: Açılmamış kanatların büyüklüğü bilinmez.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Gide

tr_quotes.quote: An, zamanın ve ebediyetin birbirine dokundukları bir belirsizlik.
tr_quotes.author: Kierkegaard

tr_quotes.quote: Gelecek güçsüzler için ulaşılmaz, korkaklar için bilinmezlik, cesurlar içinse şanstır.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Belirsizlik insan sevgisini çürütür. Seviyorsanız kavuşmayı, sevmiyorsanız ayrılığı ertelemeyin.
tr_quotes.author: Atakan Gülgar

tr_quotes.quote: Belirsizlik yorar insanı. Cesaretini topla ve sonuçtan korkmadan yapman gerekeni yap. Ne yaşarsan yaşa belirsizlikten deha az yorar.
tr_quotes.author: Aret Vartanyan

tr_quotes.quote: Acının kış ayları, ne yapsam belirsizim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanı en çok yoran belirsizlik ve ne yapacağına karar verememekmiş bunu bir kez daha anladım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Şimdi sen; uzattığın elini tutmayan ele mi kırgınsın yoksa tutmayacak bir ele uzattığın için, kendine mi kızgınsın?
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Netlikleri seviyorum ama belirsize aşığım...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her şey karışık, acı dolu. Her şey nedensiz, belirsiz...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mavinin sonsuzluğu gibiydi sana olan sevgim sen ise siyahın gizemi kadar belirsizdin...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Süre gelen sessizlikler hep fırtına getirir derler. Hangi rüzgar, hangi yöne savurur bilinmez ki...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat, biz gelecek için planlar yaparken başımıza gelenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: John Lennon

tr_quotes.quote: Yarının belirsizliğinden daha kesin bir şey yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Belirsizlik insan sevgisini çürütür. Seviyorsanız kavuşmayı, Sevmiyorsanız ayrılığı ertelemeyin.
tr_quotes.author: Atakan Gülgar

tr_quotes.quote: Zamanın, kime dost, kime düşman olacağı bilinmez.
tr_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

tr_quotes.quote: Gitmek mi yitmektir, kalmak mı artık bilmiyorum. Yerini yadırgayan eşyalar gibiydim.
tr_quotes.author: Birhan Keskin

tr_quotes.quote: Gönlümün derinlerinde istemediğim şeyi biliyorum; ama ne istediğimi bilmiyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Nikos Kazancakis

tr_quotes.quote: Ne istediğimi kendim de bilmiyordum; hayattan korkuyordum, hayattan kaçıp uzaklaşmak istiyordum, ama genede hayattan bir şeyler bekliyordum.
tr_quotes.author: Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: Beklemek de acı vericidir, unutmak da. Ama en berbatı bu ikisi arasında karar verememektir. Beklemeli mi? Unutmalı mı?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Birine umut vermek ona yapabileceğiniz en büyük kötülüktür bazen. Karşılığını veremeyeceğiniz şeyler için umut vermeyin, altında kalırsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kuşlara benzer kelimeler, odana dolarlar bir akşam. Nereden gelirler bilinmez. Kâh çığlık çığlığadırlar, kâh sesleri işitilmez...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Elbet bir derinliği vardır gecenin, bundandır duygularımıza bir eksen bulamayışımız..
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Belirsizlik hasta eder, kesinlik yaralar...
tr_quotes.author: Murat Menteş

tr_quotes.quote: Bir anlık değil boğulduğum bilinmezlik. Acısı çıkıyor sustuklarımın. Oysa ben iyiyim görünürde...
tr_quotes.author: İbrahim Tenekeci

tr_quotes.quote: Yetmişine merdiven dayamış gibi hissediyorsam yanında, artık huzuruma kavuştuğumdandır. Hareketlerimde bir ağırlık, sözlerimde bir bilinmezlik var ise bahtiyar olduğumdandır. Hoş gör...
tr_quotes.author: Fırat Dere

tr_quotes.quote: Bir kez koptuğunda tekrar olmaz derlerdi, inanmazdım kendimi çok kandırmışım bu belirsiz avuntularla...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Onu affetmedim, unutmadım. Sadece insan bazen vazgeçmek zorunda kalır. Hepsi bu...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen benim gökyüzümdün, denizim, toprağımdın; şimdi bir hatıra olamazsın belirsiz, uzak... Biliyorsun bazı şeyler vardır elimizde olmayan, işte öyle imkansız bir şey seni unutmak...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Seni korkutacak geçtiğin yollar, arkandan gelecek hep ayak sesim. Sarıp vücudunu belirsiz kollar, enseni yakacak ateş nefesim...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ne olduğu belirsiz olan içimde fazlalaşmış bir acı var...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bütün solgun pencerelerde gece, belirsiz bir düşünce gibi...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sesim boşlukta donup kaldı. Oysa sana seslenecektim. Bana gel, sana muhtacım diyecektim. Neden incindiğini soracaktım. Söyleyemedim sensizliğin acısını...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ama unutmak için ne kadar çabalarsam çabalayım,yüreğimin ta derinliklerinde, kenar çizgileri belirsiz bir boşluk öylece duruyordu...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Zor olsa gerek, seni her defasında hayal kırıklığına uğratan birini anlamaya çalışmaya kendini mecbur bırakmak...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Acının kış ayları,ne yapsam belirsizim...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç olmayacak mısın? Hep bu belirsiz sessizlik mi kalacak içimde, sevinçler gelmeyecek mi içime...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gece duyulan belirli belirsiz sesler gibi, seni sevmek... Sahi böyle mi yazılıyor şiirler? Acılar ve üzülmek.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat başı sonu belirsiz, bulut gibi dağınık, ansızın yön ve biçim değiştirme yeteneğine sahip bir şey. Hayat tanımlanamayan bir şey. Hatta sanki sadece bir fikirdir hayat, daha ötesi değildir...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi rüzgarında savrulan bir hayat bu benimkisi; öyle usul, sessiz, belli belirsiz...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kalbin, sabahın beşi kadar belirsiz. Ne karanlık belli, ne de aydınlık...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bilinmez hangi kırık kalbin duasıdır karanlıkları aydınlatan.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Açılmamış kanatların büyüklüğü bilinmez.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Gide

tr_quotes.quote: Gelecek güçsüzler için ulaşılmaz, korkaklar için bilinmezlik, cesurlar içinse şanstır.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Bilinmez kim için ettiğin duadır seni ayakta tutan...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ben sana mecburum, bilemezsin...
tr_quotes.author: Attila İlhan

tr_quotes.quote: Aslında bilinenin aksine, bir bilinmezlik içinde yaşıyor insan
tr_quotes.author: Atakan Korkmaz

en_quotes.quote: Faith means living with uncertainty – feeling your way through life, letting your heart guide you like a lantern in the dark.
en_quotes.author: Dan Millman

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty is the only certainty there is, and knowing how to live with insecurity is the only security.
en_quotes.author: John Allen Paulos

en_quotes.quote: The quality of your life is directly related to how much uncertainty you can comfortably handle.
en_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

en_quotes.quote: The quest for certainty blocks the search for meaning. Uncertainty is the very condition to impel man to unfold his powers.
en_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

en_quotes.quote: Maturity is the capacity to endure uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: John Huston Finley

en_quotes.quote: Human spirit is the ability to face the uncertainty of the future with curiosity and optimism.
en_quotes.author: Bernard Beckett

en_quotes.quote: Doubt is not a pleasant condition, but certainty is absurd.
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Hope — Hope in the face of difficulty. Hope in the face of uncertainty. The audacity of hope! In the end, that is God’s greatest gift to us…A belief in things not seen. A belief that there are better days ahead.
en_quotes.author: Barack Obama

en_quotes.quote: The future is uncertain… but this uncertainty is at the very heart of human creativity.
en_quotes.author: Ilya Prigogine

en_quotes.quote: For my part I know nothing with any certainty, but the sight of the stars makes me dream.
en_quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: In these matters the only certainty is that nothing is certain.
en_quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

en_quotes.quote: The only thing that makes life possible is permanent, intolerable uncertainty; not knowing what comes next.
en_quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

en_quotes.quote: The very essence of romance is uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Change is all about motion, motion is all about uncertainty and we are deeply uncomfortable with uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

en_quotes.quote: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: I think it’s much more interesting to live not knowing than to have answers which might be wrong.
en_quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

en_quotes.quote: Having faith doesn’t mean I have all the answers. It means trusting God especially in the midst of uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: Lysa TerKeurst

en_quotes.quote: Although our intellect always longs for clarity and certainty, our nature often finds uncertainty fascinating.
en_quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

en_quotes.quote: One does not discover new lands without consenting to lose sight of the shore for a very long time.
en_quotes.author: Andre Gide

en_quotes.quote: Not to be absolutely certain is, I think, one of the essential things in rationality.
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: Vulnerability is not weakness. And that myth is profoundly dangerous… I define vulnerability as emotional risk, exposure, uncertainty. It fuels our daily lives.
en_quotes.author: Brené Brown

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty and expectation are the joys of life. Security is an insipid thing.
en_quotes.author: William Congreve

en_quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid to take a big step if one is indicated. You can’t cross a chasm in two small jumps.
en_quotes.author: David Lloyd George

en_quotes.quote: We demand rigidly defined areas of doubt and uncertainty!
en_quotes.author: Douglas Adams

en_quotes.quote: When 99% of people doubt your idea, you’re either gravely wrong or about to make history.
en_quotes.author: Scott Belsky

en_quotes.quote: A time of uncertainty, of not knowing exactly where we’re headed, or what kind of choice to make is a Zen moment.
en_quotes.author: Brenda Shoshanna

en_quotes.quote: Without the element of uncertainty, the bringing off of even, the greatest business triumph would be dull, routine, and eminently unsatisfying.
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: An image is a stop the mind makes between uncertainties.
en_quotes.author: Djuna Barnes

en_quotes.quote: It is an act of courage to acknowledge our own uncertainty and sit with it for a while.
en_quotes.author: Harriet Lerner

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty is a sign of humility, and humility is just the ability or the willingness to learn.
en_quotes.author: Charlie Sheen

en_quotes.quote: Knowledge is an unending adventure at the edge of uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: Jacob Bronowski

en_quotes.quote: Teach yourself to work in uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: Bernard Malamud

en_quotes.quote: I used to be scared of uncertainty; now I get a high out of it.
en_quotes.author: Jensen Ackles

en_quotes.quote: He is no wise man who will quit a certainty for an uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: All uncertainty is fruitful … so long as it is accompanied by the wish to understand.
en_quotes.author: Antonio Machado

en_quotes.quote: We are not to be anxious about the unknown future or to fret about it. We are to live in a moment-by-moment dependence upon God.
en_quotes.author: James Montgomery Boice

en_quotes.quote: We sail within a vast sphere, ever drifting in uncertainty, driven from end to end.
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: If you aren’t in the moment, you are either looking forward to uncertainty, or back to pain and regret.
en_quotes.author: Jim Carrey

en_quotes.quote: Fear comes from uncertainty. When we are absolutely certain, whether of our worth or worthlessness, we are almost impervious to fear.
en_quotes.author: William Congreve

en_quotes.quote: Medicine is a science of uncertainty and an art of probability.
en_quotes.author: William Osler

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty is the refuge of hope.
en_quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

en_quotes.quote: As far as the laws of mathematics refer to reality, they are not certain, and as far as they are certain, they do not refer to reality.
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Who knows whether the gods will add tomorrow to the present hour?
en_quotes.author: Horace

en_quotes.quote: We measure our days out in steps of uncertainty not turning to see how far we’ve come. And peer down the highway from here to eternity and reach out for love on the run.
en_quotes.author: Al Stewart

en_quotes.quote: Never Have Your Dog Stuffed is really advice to myself, a reminder to myself not to avoid change or uncertainty, but to go with it, to surf into change.
en_quotes.author: Alan Alda

en_quotes.quote: There is no such uncertainty as a sure thing.
en_quotes.author: Robert Burns

en_quotes.quote: Certainty is the mother of quiet and repose, and uncertainty the cause of variance and contentions.
en_quotes.author: Edward Coke

en_quotes.quote: Yes, risk-taking is inherently failure-prone. Otherwise, it would be called sure-thing taking.
en_quotes.author: Jim McMahon

en_quotes.quote: Truth is confirmed by inspection and delay; falsehood by haste and uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: Tacitus

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty is the worst of all evils until the moment when reality makes us regret uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: Alphonse Karr

en_quotes.quote: The basis of your life is absolute freedom, the goal is joy, and the result of that perfect combination is motion forward, or growth.
en_quotes.author: Abraham-Hicks

en_quotes.quote: Looking deeper, we could say that the real cause of suffering is not being able to tolerate uncertainty—and thinking that it’s perfectly sane, perfectly normal, to deny the fundamental groundlessness of being human.
en_quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

en_quotes.quote: True security lies in the unrestrained embrace of insecurity — in the recognition that we never really stand on solid ground, and never can.
en_quotes.author: Oliver Burkeman

en_quotes.quote: It is not how we live in the light that enlightens us, it is how we live in the dark.
en_quotes.author: Rune Lazuli

en_quotes.quote: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
en_quotes.author: Albus Dumbledore

en_quotes.quote: If uncertainty is unacceptable to you, it turns into fear. If it is perfectly acceptable, it turns into increased aliveness, alertness, and creativity.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: Sticking with that uncertainty, getting the knack of relaxing in the midst of chaos, learning not to panic—this is the spiritual path.
en_quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

en_quotes.quote: Leave everything undefined, including yourself. Befriend uncertainty. Fall in love with mystery. Kneel at the altar of Not Knowing. Give your questions time to breathe. And the answers will find you.
en_quotes.author: Jeff Foster

en_quotes.quote: Only when we are brave enough to explore the darkness will we discover the infinite power of our own light.
en_quotes.author: Brené Brown

en_quotes.quote: Trusting that there is a next step is the first step to figuring out what the next step is.
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Williamson

en_quotes.quote: Being at ease with not knowing is crucial for answers to come to you.
en_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

en_quotes.quote: Embrace uncertainty. Some of the most beautiful chapters in our lives won’t have a title until much later
en_quotes.author: Bob Goff

en_quotes.quote: I am learning to trust the journey even when I do not understand it.
en_quotes.author: Mila Bron

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty and mystery are energies of life. Don’t let them scare you unduly, for they keep boredom at bay and spark creativity.
en_quotes.author: R. I. Fitzhenry

en_quotes.quote: Looking deeper, we could say that the real cause of suffering is not being able to tolerate uncertainty—and thinking that it’s perfectly sane, perfectly normal, to deny the fundamental groundlessness of being human.
en_quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

en_quotes.quote: The quest for certainty blocks the search for meaning. Uncertainty is the very condition to impel man to unfold his powers.
en_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

en_quotes.quote: For my part, I know nothing with any certainty, but the sight of the stars, makes me dream.
en_quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: A cheerful readiness is what seems honest now, facing an uncertain future with humor, grace and dignity.
en_quotes.author: Marty Rubin

en_quotes.quote: The uncertainties of life will attempt to throw you off balance. Make peace with it, and the scale will tip back in your favor.
en_quotes.author: Christine E. Szymanski

en_quotes.quote: Your first enemy, your biggest enemy, is the person who shook your certainty.
en_quotes.author: Meir Ezra

en_quotes.quote: Faith means living with uncertainty―feeling your way through life, letting your heart guide you like a lantern in the dark.
en_quotes.author: Dan Millman

en_quotes.quote: The quality of your life is in direct proportion to the amount of uncertainty you can comfortably deal with.
en_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

en_quotes.quote: If there’s one thing that’s certain in business, it’s uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: Stephen Covey

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty is the only certainty there is, and knowing how to live with insecurity is the only security.
en_quotes.author: John Allen Paulos

en_quotes.quote: Without the element of uncertainty, the bringing off of even, the greatest business triumph would be dull, routine, and eminently unsatisfying.
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: If I cease searching, then, woe is me, I am lost. That is how I look at it – keep going, keep going come what may.
en_quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: Maturity is the capacity to endure uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: John Huston Finley

en_quotes.quote: Although our intellect always longs for clarity and certainty, our nature often finds uncertainty fascinating.
en_quotes.author: Karl Von Clausewitz

en_quotes.quote: The future is uncertain… but this uncertainty is at the very heart of human creativity.
en_quotes.author: Ilya Prigogine

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty is the refuge of hope.
en_quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

en_quotes.quote: Information is the resolution of uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: Claude Shannon

en_quotes.quote: If you aren’t in the moment, you are either looking forward to uncertainty or back to pain and regret.
en_quotes.author: Jim Carrey

en_quotes.quote: Fear is often our immediate response to uncertainty. There’s nothing wrong with experiencing fear. The key is not to get stuck in it.
en_quotes.author: Gabrielle Bernstein

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty always creates doubt, and doubt creates fear.
en_quotes.author: Oscar Munoz

en_quotes.quote: The only thing that makes life possible is permanent, intolerable uncertainty; not knowing what comes next.
en_quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

en_quotes.quote: To try is to invite uncertainty. Where confidence goes, success usually follows.
en_quotes.author: Wayne Gerard Trotman

en_quotes.quote: When you embrace the uncertain, life opens up unusual new paths. Seeds sowed way back bloom as flowers, in ways one can never fathom.
en_quotes.author: Subroto Bagchi

en_quotes.quote: A person can always be sure of what they don’t know. They might not be sure of what they know.
en_quotes.author: Tom Rob Smith

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty is part of the tapestry of life.
en_quotes.author: Emiljano Citaku

en_quotes.quote: I would choose uncertainty with a chance of happiness over certainty with guaranteed unhappiness on any given day.
en_quotes.author: Omar Cherif

en_quotes.quote: Regardless of your faith, you can never escape uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

en_quotes.quote: When the uncertain future becomes the past, the past in turn becomes uncertain.
en_quotes.author: Mohsin Hamid

en_quotes.quote: Everything tells me you care for me. And yet never a sign from you.
en_quotes.author: André Aciman

en_quotes.quote: The mistake is thinking that there can be an antidote to the uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: David Levithan

en_quotes.quote: We demand rigidly defined areas of doubt and uncertainty!
en_quotes.author: Douglas Adams

en_quotes.quote: People who are great at making decisions in the face of uncertainty have great judgment.
en_quotes.author: Andy Dunn

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty is the worst of all evils until the moment when reality makes us regret uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: Alphonse Karr

en_quotes.quote: Life is full of change and uncertainty. We know this. We experience it on a daily basis.
en_quotes.author: Carre Otis

en_quotes.quote: If there’s one thing that’s certain in business, it’s uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: Stephen Covey

en_quotes.quote: The quest for certainty blocks the search for meaning. Uncertainty is the very condition to impel man to unfold his powers.
en_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

en_quotes.quote: Vulnerability is basically uncertainty, risk, and emotional exposure.
en_quotes.author: Brene Brown

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty will always be part of the taking charge process.
en_quotes.author: Harold S. Geneen

en_quotes.quote: Major organizational changes create uncertainty.
en_quotes.author: Irene Rosenfeld

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty is a very good thing: it’s the beginning of an investigation, and the investigation should never end.
en_quotes.author: Tim Crouch

en_quotes.quote: I have devoted my life to uncertainty. Certainty is the death of wisdom, thought, creativity.
en_quotes.author: Shekhar Kapur

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty is not an indication of poor leadership; it underscores the need for leadership.
en_quotes.author: Andy Stanley

en_quotes.quote: For all of its uncertainty, we cannot flee the future.
en_quotes.author: Barbara Jordan

en_quotes.quote: Although our intellect always longs for clarity and certainty, our nature often finds uncertainty fascinating.
en_quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

en_quotes.quote: There is no such uncertainty as a sure thing.
en_quotes.author: Robert Burns
